name: Sanic Infinite Runner
description:
Sanic is an infinite runner I made back in high school over the span of two or three days as a joke. It being the first thing resembling a video game I've created, It's a cobbled mishmash of items I threw together from the internet (of which I own none), with my additions to them being programming and slight sprite editing to get some gifs to work.

Sanic promotes up to 4 player hotseat, where each player is able to select which Sanic they wish to play as by clicking on their tummy. 

Controls are:

Enter: proceed in menus

Up & Down arrows: player 1 movement

W & S keys: player 2 movement

Shift & Tab: player 3 movement

I & K keys: player 4 movement
